___showByDefault.description: Whether this clinical concept should be displayed by default. False if unset.

___lower.description: Lower display bound for this concept. If unset, will be calculated based on data.

___upper.description: Upper display bound for this concept. If unset, will be calculated based on data.

___innerComponentOnly.description: If set, the ResourceCode for this component will be created, but it will not be displayed unless it is an inner component of another Resource.

___forceDisplayBounds.description: Whether the display bounds should be forced even if the data is outside of them. No effect if displayBounds are unset. False if this is unset.

___displayName.description: The display name for this clinical concept, as returned by the FHIR server.

____comments.description: Optional comments about the clinical concept

___codeString.description: The code (ex: LOINC, RxNorm) for this clinical concept.

___groupName.description: If set, this clinical concept will appear grouped with the same groupName. If unset, it will appear independently.
